title: Dinner Tonight: Curried Sautéed Cauliflower Recipe
full_text:
Dinner Tonight: Curried Sautéed Cauliflower Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
10 mins
Total
10 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
head
cauliflower
, chopped into 1/2 inch pieces
1
red onion
, chopped
2
tablespoons
Canola oil
1
tablespoon
curry powder
1/2
cup
cilantro
, chopped
Salt and pepper
Directions
Heat a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the oil, let it warm up for a bit and then dump in the cauliflower, onion, and curry powder.
Stir until the curry powder has coated the cauliflower. Cook for about six minutes.
Toss in the cilantro, and then remove from the heat and serve. It’s also rather nice as a cold side.
Vegetable Sides
Vegetarian Sides

Cauliflower
